    /* hide behavior */

  display: flex;

  -webkit-box-pack: center;
  -ms-flex-pack: center;

  position: relative;

  width: 100%

  .alphabetList {
    -ms-flex-wrap: nowrap;
    flex-wrap: nowrap;
    -webkit-box-pack: justify;

    word-wrap: normal;
    display: block
  }
  .line-clamp .readMore__text &gt; p:nth-child(3) {
    -webkit-line-clamp: unset;
    -webkit-box-orient: unset;
    display: block;
    -webkit-transform: none;
    -ms-transform: none;
    transform: none
  }
  .readMore__text &gt; p:nth-child(4) {
    display: block;
    max-height: none;
    overflow: initial;
    -o-text-overflow: clip;
    text-overflow: clip;
    white-space: normal;
    word-wrap: normal;
    display: block
  }
  .line-clamp .readMore__text &gt; p:nth-child(4) {
    -webkit-line-clamp: unset;
    -webkit-box-orient: unset;
    display: block;
    -webkit-transform: none;
    -ms-transform: none;
    transform: none
  }
  .readMore__text &gt; p:nth-child(5) {
    display: block;
    max-height: none;
    overflow: initial;
    -o-text-overflow: clip;
    text-overflow: clip;
    white-space: normal;
    word-wrap: normal;
    display: block
  }
  .line-clamp .readMore__text &gt; p:nth-child(5) {
    -webkit-line-clamp: unset;
    -webkit-box-orient: unset;
    display: block;
    -webkit-transform: none;
    -ms-transform: none;
    transform: none
  }
  .readMore__text &gt; p:nth-child(5) {
    display: block;
    max-height: none;
    overflow: initial;
    -o-text-overflow: clip;
    text-overflow: clip;
    white-space: normal;
    word-wrap: normal
  }
  .line-clamp .readMore__text &gt; p:nth-child(5) {
    -webkit-line-clamp: unset;
    -webkit-box-orient: unset;
    display: block;
    -webkit-transform: none;
    -ms-transform: none;
    transform: none
  }
  .line-clamp .readMore__text &gt; p:nth-child(5) {
    display: inline-block;
    max-width: 100%;

    -o-text-overflow: ellipsis;
    text-overflow: ellipsis;
    white-space: nowrap;
    word-wrap: normal;
    display: block;

    -webkit-box-orient: vertical;

    max-width: 100%;

    -webkit-line-clamp: unset;

    -webkit-transform: none;
    -ms-transform: none;
    transform: none

.masthead--white .masthead__content {
  background: -webkit-gradient(linear,left top,left bottom,from(rgba(0,0,0,.35)),to(transparent));
  background: -o-linear-gradient(top,rgba(0,0,0,.35) 0,transparent 100%);
  background: linear-gradient(to bottom,rgba(0,0,0,.35) 0,transparent 100%);
  text-shadow: 0 0 2em rgba(0,0,0,.3)
}

  .masthead--white .masthead__content {
    background: 0 0;
    text-shadow: none
  }
}

  background: 0 0;
  text-shadow: none
}

    word-wrap: normal;
    display: block;
    -webkit-line-clamp: 3;
    -webkit-box-orient: vertical;
    display: -webkit-box;
    max-width: 100%;
    overflow: hidden;
    -webkit-transform: translateX(0);
    -ms-transform: translateX(0);
    transform: translateX(0);
    white-space: normal;
    width: 100%
  }
}

  font-family: ladybird-bold;
  font-style: normal;
  font-weight: 400;
  src: url(../../../assets/penguin/fonts/LdyBr5B.eot);

.prhSelect {
  background-color: #fff;
  cursor: pointer;
  display: inline-block;
  outline: 0;
  position: relative;
  width: 100%
}

  .prhSelect {
    min-width: 66.66667%;
    width: auto
  }
}

  content: ''
}
